title: Lucky Kabootar
plot: The story is about four young friends who are enriched with the same ideology and through series of comedic experiences, they chase their dream of migrating to the land of Punjabis and maple syrup, Canada.
synopsis:
The story is about four young friends who are enriched with the same ideology and through series of comedic experiences, they chase their dream of migrating to the land of Punjabis and maple syrup, Canada.
The movie will follow through two different narratives from which one of the narratives is of the friend who has already migrated to Canada through a company he was working for in India. The other narrative shows how the other three friends who saw the same dream, now want to go to Canada to join their friend. The three friends have their own reasons and back stories, which will show the audience why is it so important for these young Punjabi boys to travel abroad.
Amongst the three, the first friend dreams of becoming a chef but struggles to even speak two sentences in English, which makes it hard for him to pass the basic language proficiency tests. The second friend is a madly in love, who will do anything for the love of his life. The girl he likes keeps a condition that the boy will have to earn an NRI tag and then only he can make the parents of girl ready for marriage. The third friend is a defamed and talentless singer, who envisions to reverse the curse and make himself successful by traveling to Canada.
The story revolves around how these three muskeeters plan to enter migrate to Canada when the right channels dosen't work for them. Finding solutions to enter Canada they all get themseleves in trouble.
PTC box office Lucky Kabootar is directed by Ojaswwsee Sharma and it is a mix of comedy, love persistence and adventure. So be ready to watch this super entertaining film "Lucky Kabootar" on Friday, 7th September only on PTC Punjabi.
